author: perezhilton
title: Ryan Gosling Looks So Fucking Hot On The Oscars Red Carpet! | CocoPerez.com
text:
Be still our hearts!
While on the Oscars red carpet on Sunday, Ryan Gosling totally brought the heat. Like, there's no denying how hot the La La Land actor looks in this particular ensemble!
We mean, only Ryan can make ruffles look THIS sexy. Although, we bet the former Disney darling would look good wearing a garbage bag. No joke.
Sadly, the 36-year-old's baby momma and other half Eva Mendes was MIA on the red carpet. However, the twosome are known for being particularly private, so Miz Mendes' absence from the awards show isn't really a shock.
But hey, Ryan looked good enough for the two of them! LOLz.
[ Image via Getty Images .]
Tags: disney , eva mendes , fashion smashion , oscars , photos! , red carpet , ryan gosling
